--- select_singer_with_hash_join.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  Singers A
  HASH JOIN
  Singers B
  ON A.SingerID = B.SingerID
--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Results: []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.Star{
        Star: 9,
      },
    },
    From: &ast.From{
      From:   11,
      Source: &ast.Join{
        Op:     "INNER JOIN",
        Method: "HASH",
        Left:   &ast.TableName{
          Table: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 18,
            NameEnd: 25,
            Name:    "Singers",
          },
          As: &ast.AsAlias{
            As:    -1,
            Alias: &ast.Ident{
              NamePos: 26,
              NameEnd: 27,
              Name:    "A",
            },
          },
        },
        Right: &ast.TableName{
          Table: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 42,
            NameEnd: 49,
            Name:    "Singers",
          },
          As: &ast.AsAlias{
            As:    -1,
            Alias: &ast.Ident{
              NamePos: 50,
              NameEnd: 51,
              Name:    "B",
            },
          },
        },
        Cond: &ast.On{
          On:   54,
          Expr: &ast.BinaryExpr{
            Op:   "=",
            Left: &ast.Path{
              Idents: []*ast.Ident{
                &ast.Ident{
                  NamePos: 57,
                  NameEnd: 58,
                  Name:    "A",
                },
                &ast.Ident{
                  NamePos: 59,
                  NameEnd: 67,
                  Name:    "SingerID",
                },
              },
            },
            Right: &ast.Path{
              Idents: []*ast.Ident{
                &ast.Ident{
                  NamePos: 70,
                  NameEnd: 71,
                  Name:    "B",
                },
                &ast.Ident{
                  NamePos: 72,
                  NameEnd: 80,
                  Name:    "SingerID",
                },
              },
            },
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM Singers A INNER JOIN Singers B ON A.SingerID = B.SingerID
